languages.text: Attacks an enemy that has been marked by {g|f:5bc82ef262b34734a959acea5e2d43dd}Claw Brand{/g}. Deals 100 {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} in a 3×3 square around the marked target. The damage is equally distributed between all affected creatures.

traits.locale_text: Attacks an enemy that has been marked by Claw Brand. Deals 100 damage in a 3×3 square around the marked target. The damage is equally distributed between all affected creatures.

Attacks an enemy that has been marked by Claw Brand. Deals 100 {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} in a 3×3 square around the marked target. The damage is equally distributed between all affected creatures.

Attacks an enemy that has been marked by Claw Brand. Deals 100 {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} in a 3×3 square around the marked target. The damage is equally distributed between all affected creatures.

languages.text: Атакует противника, отмеченного Следом от когтей. Наносит 100 {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урона{/g} по области 3×3 вокруг отмеченной цели. Этот урон равномерно распределяется между всеми целями в области.
languages.original_text: Attacks an enemy that has been marked by Claw Brand. Deals 100 {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} in a 3×3 square around the marked target. The damage is equally distributed between all affected creatures.

traits.locale_text: Атакует противника, отмеченного Следом от когтей. Наносит 100 урона по области 3×3 вокруг отмеченной цели. Этот урон равномерно распределяется между всеми целями в области.
Атакует противника, отмеченного Следом от когтей. Наносит 100 урона по области 3×3 вокруг отмеченной цели. Этот урон равномерно распределяется между всеми целями в области.

languages.text: 攻击被{g|f:5bc82ef262b34734a959acea5e2d43dd}利爪之痕{/g}标记的敌人。对被标记的敌人周围3×3范围内造成100点{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}。此伤害会平均分配给所有受影响的生物。
languages.original_text: Attacks an enemy that has been marked by {g|f:5bc82ef262b34734a959acea5e2d43dd}Claw Brand{/g}. Deals 100 {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} in a 3×3 square around the marked target. The damage is equally distributed between all affected creatures.

traits.locale_text: 攻击被利爪之痕标记的敌人。对被标记的敌人周围3×3范围内造成100点伤害。此伤害会平均分配给所有受影响的生物。

languages.text: 爪の刻印が付いた敵を攻撃する。マークされたターゲットの周囲の 3×3 マスに100の{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}を与える。ダメージはすべての効果を受けた生き物の間で同等に分配される。
languages.original_text: Attacks an enemy that has been marked by Claw Brand. Deals 100 {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} in a 3×3 square around the marked target. The damage is equally distributed between all affected creatures.

traits.locale_text: 爪の刻印が付いた敵を攻撃する。マークされたターゲットの周囲 3×3 マスに100のダメージを与える。ダメージは全ての効果を受けた生物の間で同等に分配される。

languages.text: Ataca a un enemigo marcado por {g|f:5bc82ef262b34734a959acea5e2d43dd}Marca de garra{/g}. Inflige 100 puntos de {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g} en un cuadrado de 3×3 en torno al objetivo marcado. El daño se divide a partes iguales entre todas las criaturas afectadas.
languages.original_text: Attacks an enemy that has been marked by {g|f:5bc82ef262b34734a959acea5e2d43dd}Claw Brand{/g}. Deals 100 {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} in a 3×3 square around the marked target. The damage is equally distributed between all affected creatures.

traits.locale_text: Ataca a un enemigo marcado por Marca de garra. Inflige 100 puntos de daño en un cuadrado de 3x3 en torno al objetivo marcado. El daño se divide a partes iguales entre todas las criaturas afectadas.

languages.text: Greift einen Gegner an, der mit {g|f:5bc82ef262b34734a959acea5e2d43dd}Klauenmal{/g} markiert wurde. Verursacht 100 {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Schaden{/g} in einem Bereich von 3×3 Feldern um das markierte Ziel. Der Schaden wird gleichmäßig auf alle betroffenen Kreaturen verteilt.
languages.original_text: Attacks an enemy that has been marked by {g|f:5bc82ef262b34734a959acea5e2d43dd}Claw Brand{/g}. Deals 100 {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} in a 3×3 square around the marked target. The damage is equally distributed between all affected creatures.

traits.locale_text: Greift einen Gegner an, der mit Klauenmal markiert wurde. Verursacht 100 Schaden in einem Bereich von 3×3 Feldern um das markierte Ziel. Der Schaden wird gleichmäßig auf alle betroffenen Kreaturen verteilt.

languages.text: Attaque un ennemi désigné par {g|f:5bc82ef262b34734a959acea5e2d43dd}Marque de griffes{/g}. Inflige 100 points de {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g} dans un carré de 3 × 3 cases autour de la cible. Les dégâts sont répartis équitablement entre toutes les créatures affectées.
languages.original_text: Attacks an enemy that has been marked by {g|f:5bc82ef262b34734a959acea5e2d43dd}Claw Brand{/g}. Deals 100 {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} in a 3×3 square around the marked target. The damage is equally distributed between all affected creatures.

traits.locale_text: Attaque un ennemi désigné par Marque de Griffes. Inflige 100 points de dégâts dans un carré de 3 × 3 cases autour de la cible désignée. Les dégâts sont répartis équitablement entre toutes les créatures affectées.

languages.text: {g|f:5bc82ef262b34734a959acea5e2d43dd}Pençe Damgası{/g} ile işaretlenmiş bir düşmana saldırır. İşaretlenen hedefin çevresindeki 3×3 hücrelik bir alanda 100 puan {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}hasar{/g} verir. Hasar, etkilenen tüm yaratıklar arasında eşit olarak dağıtılır.
